text: ya eyyuhe-llezine amenu liyeste'zinkumu-llezine meleket eymanukum vellezine lem yeblugu-lhulume minkum selase merrat. min kabli salati-lfecri vehine teda`une siyabekum mine-zzahirati vemim ba`di salati-l`isa'. selasu `avratil lekum. leyse `aleykum vela `aleyhim cunahum ba`dehunn. tavvafune `aleykum ba`dukum `ala ba`d. kezalike yubeyyinu-llahu lekumu-l'ayat. vellahu `alimun hakim
